title: KOIOS Personal Blender 850W Juicer for Shakes Smoothies Seasonings Sauce Kitchen
item_description:
KOIOS Personal Blender 850W Juicer for Shakes Smoothies Seasonings Sauce Kitchen
KOIOS Personal Portable Blender - 4 KEY ADVANTAGES: EFFICIENCY, DESIGN, VERSATILITY, PROTECTION.
Boosted Power: Thanks to KOIOS personal blender, enhanced with the brand new 850 Watt powerful, pure copper, high-torque motor, nutrient-extraction blades turn your ingredients into a smoothly blended drink in a flash.
Get More Capacity: KOIOS smoothie blender set includes 2 x 17oz travel bottles and a 10oz cup which are perfect for you to share blended shakes, smoothies, and healthy detox beverages with your family and friends.
Better Taste: All the ingredients are blended finely to a super-smooth texture every time for your best enjoyment.
Wonderfully Versatile: 2021 Upgraded 6-leaf blade adds more cutting per single rotation blending foods to smoothies, juices, milkshakes, sauces, jams faster and more energy-efficient, while extra flat 2-leaf blade grinds coffee beans and nuts with ease.
Superior Protection: Get used to dual-circuit protection - your new portable blender has obtained overheat and overload protection to prevent motor failures. The base suction cup can prevent the machine from sliding.
Easy to Clean: The personal blender is easy to clean! A bottle brush is included to make washing the portable blender cup effortless. Exactor blades, travel bottles and lids are dishwasher safe!
FAQ
1. Can this personal blender crush ice cubes?
Yes. Please add more than 1/3 liquid and small ice cubes. Press down the cup intermittently to crush hard ingredients and ice cubes. (Pulse blending)
2. Is the gasket ring of the blade removable?
Yes. Push the blade out of the base from the bottom. Here is a video on this page to show how to clean it.
3. Is the smoothie blender dishwasher safe?
Yes, put the cups, lids and blade in the top rack of the dishwasher.
4. My blender stops working.
The single blender is equipped with overheat and overload protection. If it stops working, please unplug the power cord, take out the cup and try to shake the cup or reduce the loaded capacity. Let the motor cool down for a while. If it still doesn't work, please tell us and we will provide the replacement.
5. Can I order more bottles?
No, more bottles are not available currently. Now, the single blender is equipped with 2x17 Oz and 1x10 Oz cups. Tall bottles are used to make juices, milkshakes and smoothies. Small cups are usually used to grind spices, nuts or coffee beans.
6. Do I have to hold the bottle the whole time to make it blend?
Yes, you need to hold the cup to make it blend. Effortlessly create your favorite meals within 10 seconds!
7. How long is the w-arranty?
3 years. If your personal smoothie blender is defective, please leave us a message and we will offer replacement at once.
Packaging Contains:
1 x Motor Base
2 x 17oz Tall Cup
1 x 10oz Cup
1 x Cross Blade Unit
1 x Flat Blade Unit
2 x Spout Lid
1 x Flat-top Lid
1 x Sieve Lid
1 x Cleaning brush
1 x User Manual
KOIOS 11 in 1 Set Smoothie Personal Blender
KOIOS Personal Smoothie Blender with an 850-watt motor is highly efficient even for tough ingredients and whole fruits/veggies. You won’t have to worry about blending nuts, seeds, leafy greens. Prepare your beverages with KOIOS travel bottles, twist a lid on, and grab your on-the-go drink anywhere.
Product Specifications
 Power: 850W
RPM: 22000
Voltage: 120V, 60Hz
Operating Time: ≤1min
Intervals: ≥2min
 Standout Features
850 Watt High-torque Power
Enhanced version 6830 pure copper motor, dual-circuit protection for over-heat and overload. The blender will shut down automatically when over-heat or overload to protect itself and increase its lifespan.
Pulse Technology
Slightly push down the cup to let the KOIOS Pulse Technology to blast the ice and frozen ingredients.
Easy to Store
Compact design makes this portable blender easy to store and takes up little space in your kitchen or RV.
Dishwasher Safe
KOIOS blender cups and lids are made of food-grade BPA-free plastic, which is durable and can be washed in a dishwasher.
 Easy to Use
1. Cut fruits into small cubes. Add more than 1/3 liquid to blend. Do not exceed the maximum capacity mark of the cup.
2. Tighten the lid and put the bottle gently on the base.
3. Press down the cup intermittently, let KOIOS Pulse Technology to blast through ice and frozen ingredients.
4. Press the lid until you hear a clik. Grab your on-the-go drink. Share drinks with your family and friends!
 Note
 Never process boiling liquids (max 140°F/60℃).
A new blender may produce a smell when it is used for the first time. The smell will disappear after repeated use.
Do not blend continuously for more than 1 min.
Not to blend with less than 1/3 liquid.
Do not exceed the maximum capacity mark of the cup.
Keep the appliance and its cord out of reach of children.
Cut fruits and vegetables into ¾-inch, 1-inch, otherwise, it will lead to overload and damage motor.
In case of a leak, before blending please check whether the blade assembly’s silicone O-ring is in the proper place and not damaged.
Unplug the blender when not in use, before removing the cup, and before cleaning.
This appliance corresponds to USA power voltage standard 110V-120V.

title: Propane Refill Adapter Hose QCC1 with ON-Off Control Valve for 1Lb To 20Lb Tank
item_description:
Propane Refill Adapter Hose QCC1 with ON-Off Control Valve for 1Lb To 20Lb Tank
About Propane Refill Adapter：
Fetures:
Easy Filling: The 90-degree elbow design makes it easier for gas to flow to the small cylinders. Simply attach to your large tank and your 16oz tanks for refilling in 1 minute.
Upgraded Design: Featured with a propane ON-Off control valve, prevents gas leaks when connecting gas cylinders. You can easily control the refilling process with safe.
Quick Monitoring: Quickly check the remaining gas of your large tank to avoid the inconvenience caused by insufficient gas during the filling process.
Safe Structure: Corrosion-resistant solid brass provides a better sealing effect. Additionally, the built-in safety features effectively prevent the danger of overfilling the gas cylinder.
Use with Ease: Easily refills your 1-pound bottles multiple times without tools. Helping you save on the cost of buying new green propane gas cylinders.
Specifications:
Material: Solid Brass
Inlet: QCC-1
Outlet: 1"-20 Female Throwaway Cylinder Thread
Safety Switch: On-Off Control Valve
Kind Reminder:
1. Because the gas is highly flammable, it can only be used outdoor and stay away from flames and sparks.
2. Make sure the valve is closed before refilling for safety.
3. Put the empty 1 lb cylinders in a freezer for several hours for quicker refills.
Operation Steps:
Step 1: Turn off the valves, attach the adapter's QCC-1 connection to the tank valve and tighten it securely. Then put your 5-40lb propane tank upside down.
Step 2: Connect the 1"-20 Female Throwaway Cylinder Thread to the empty 16oz propane fuel cylinder.
Step 3: Open the 5-40 propane tank cylinder valve.
Step 4: Then tun on on-off control valve and let the gas flow until the tank is full.
How can I tell if my propane tank is full?
1. You can weigh it empty and again after refilling, the camping propane bottle is full when the weight increases by about 1lb.
2. When inflating, you will hear the gas flowing. When is full, the sound will disappear and become quiet. It takes about 1 minute.
Can this product be used to connect a one-pound bottle to a gas grill?
No, it's a one-way valve from the propane tank to a 1lb tank. You would need a separate adapter.

 of time, convenient for those with larger tanks.

 output and provide a secure connection.

 heaters, for coleman camp stove, portable/tabletop grills, etc., good for camping, picnicking, or outdoor heating.
【SERVICE】: For any questions you are not happy with the item , you can ask for exchange or full refund under our after-sales service.
Product Description

 tanks.
-Perfect for lanterns, camp stoves, tabletop grills, mosquito magnets, outdoor heaters and more.
-Hand-tighten Counter Clockwise. No tools needed, easy and quick attachment for easier installation.
-Long lasting and easy to use.

title: VIDENT iSmart800ProBT All System OBD2 Ⅱ Diagnostic Scanner Bidirection Scan Tool
item_description:
Vident iSmart800Pro BT Auto Bluetooth All System Diagnostic Scanner 40 Service
iSmart800Pro BT is Vident new Android based Bluetooth scan tool featured with intuitive user interface, sophisticated diagnosis, wide vehicle coverage, advanced graphing, bi-directional component tests, component calibration, module coding and programming. It utilizes a 7" high resolution IPS LCD touch screen (1024 x 600), a secure, solid-state 8+64GB storage space and a Cortex processor that delivers boot-up in less than 30 seconds, the multitask-capable Android 7.1.2 Operating System to offer you the best intuitive user interface and user-customizable configuration. With an unusual combination of sophistication and simple operation, iSmart800Pro BT is suited to any tech—from rookies to seasoned diagnostic specialists.
 >>> 2023 Newest Version — One of the Most Professional Obd2 Bluetooth Diagnostic Scanner
OE-Level All System Diagnostics:Vident iSmart800Pro is a all system diagnostic scanner as it can scan all available systems of the car to ✔read/clear codes, ✔view live data stream of various sensors and graph it, record and playback the data, ✔ retrieves freeze-frame, ✔perform active tests to check the work status of modules, providing you with a Dealership-Level only diagnosis, getting the accurate and in-depth diagnosis across all automotive systems.
40+ Special Functions: Vident iSmart800Pro car diagnostic tablet has packed the all key special functions of an automotive diagnostic scanner. For example ABS Bleeding, Battery Matching, Brake Pad Replacement, Anti-theft Matching, DPF Regeneration, Odometer Calibration, Adblue Reset, Tire Pressure Reset, Service Lamp Reset, Headlamp Matching and more.Note: Special functions does NOT work on all vehicles. Pls contact us to check the compatibility before purchase.
Bi-Directional Control/Active Tests:Allows sending the command directly from diagnostic tablet to the vehicle ECUs to perform active tests, like window, door, sunroof and headlamp etc. Bidirectional Control OBD2 scanner is a standard choice in the workshop/auto repair shop, which can significantly reduce the mechanic's diagnostic time, It can also help DIYers make fault location easier.
110+ Brands Cars Coverage:iSmart800Pro BT is a comprehensive diagnostic tool, help you to troubleshoot the problems fast for 95% US, European, Asian vehicle brands. 
>>> Advanced Hardware Version
With Android 7.1.2 system, 1GB RAM & 8+64GB ROM,  7'' 1024*600 IPS LCD Touch Screen Display, 7200mAh Battery, Bi-Directional Control, All System Diagnostic, 40+ Service Functions and Support CAN FD+DoIP Protocols to bring you faster diagnosis and operation and satisfy your daily needs.
>>> 2023 Bi-Directional Scan Tool for Fast Issue Location (Active Tests)
The application of Bi-directional Control (Active Test) improves 2x faster efficiency to problems location and diagnostic accuracy.
Vident iSmart800Pro BT can output the commands to ECUs, read the ECU data and monitor the operation of the actuators. Through active tests, also called actuator tests, this bi-directional diagnostic scanner can precisely locate the car problems, letting you quickly know whether a specific system, component, or subsystem is functioning properly or not.
For example: If one of parts is not working and leads to the failure, it could be a faulty component, wiring or relay. By commanding component to do active tests, like switch on/off, via Vident iSmart800Pro BT scanner you can quickly determine whether it’s a wiring, relay, or component issue without removing any parts.
>>> 40+ Special Functions to Meet Most of Your Needs
ABS Bleeding:
1.When the ABS contains air, the ABS bleeding function must be performed to bleed the brake system to restore ABS brake sensitivity.
2.If the ABS computer, ABS pump, brake master cylinder, brake cylinder, brake line, or brake fluid is replaced, the ABS bleeding function must be performed to bleed the ABS.
Battery Matching:
1.Use the car diagnostic device to reset the car battery monitoring unit to clear original fault information about insufficient battery electric quantity, and match the battery again and monitor battery based on current battery information.
2.Battery matching must be performed in the following cases:
a) Main battery is replaced. Battery matching must be performed to clear original electric quantity insufficiency information and prevent the related control module from detecting false information. If the related control module detects false information, it will invalidate some electric auxiliary functions, such as automatic start&stop function, sunroof without one-key trigger function, power window without automatic function.
b) Battery monitoring sensor. Battery matching is performed to re-match the control module and motoring sensor to detect battery electric quantity use information more accurately, which can avoid the instrument panel displaying false information.
Brake Pad Replacement:
1.If the brake pad wears the brake pad sense line, the brake pad sense line sends a signal sense line to the on-board computer to replace the brake pad. After replacing the brake pad, you must reset the brake pad. Otherwise, the car alarms.
2.Reset must be performed in the following cases:
a) The brake pad and brake pad wear sensor are replaced.
b) The brake pad indicator lamp is on.
c) The brake pad sensor circuit is short, which is recovered.
d) The servo motor is replaced.
Anti-theft Matching:
1.To prevent the car being used by unauthorized keys, the anti-theft key matching function must be performed so that the immobilizer control system on the car identifies and authorizes remote control keys to normally use the car.
2.When the ignition switch key, ignition switch, combined instrument panel, ECU, BCM, or remote control battery is replaced, anti-theft key matching must be performed.
DPF Regeneration:
1.DPF regeneration is used to regularly clear PM (particulate matter) from the trap in combustion oxidation mode (such as high temperature heating combustion, fuel additive or catalyst reduce PM fire point combustion) to stabilize trap performance.
2.DPF regeneration matching must be performed in the following cases:
a) The bleeding backpressure sensor is replaced.
b) The PM trap is removed or replaced.
c) The fuel additive injector is removed or replaced.
d) The catalytic oxygenizer is removed or replaced.
e) The DPF regeneration MIL is on and maintenance is performed.
f) The DPF regeneration control module is replaced.
Odometer Calibration:
1.Instrument panel mileage calibration is used to copy, write, or rewrite mileages. That is, use the car diagnostic computer and data line to copy, write, or rewrite chip data on the instrument panel to make the instrument panel display actual mileages.
2.Usually, when the vehicle speed sensor is damaged or the mileage is incorrect due to instrument panel faults, you must perform mileage calibration after maintenance.
Adblue Reset:
After the diesel exhaust gas treatment fluid (automobile urea) is replaced or filled up, the urea reset operation is required.
Tire Pressure Reset:
1.After the tire pressure MIL turns on and maintenance is performed, the tire pressure resetting function must be performed to reset tire pressure and turn off the tire pressure MIL.
2.Tire pressure resetting must be performed after maintenance is performed in the following cases: tire pressure is too low, tire leaks, tire pressure monitoring device is replaced or installed, tire is replaced, tire pressure sensor is damaged, tire is replaced for the car with tire pressure monitoring function
Service Lamp Reset:
1.If the service lamp is on, you must provide service for the car. After service, you need to reset the driving mileage or driving time so that the service lamp turns off and the system enables the new service cycle.
2.After changing engine oil or electric appliances that monitor oil life, you need to reset the service lamp.
Headlamp Matching:
This function is used to initialize the adaptive headlight system. The adaptive headlight system determines whether to automatically turn on the headlight according to ambient light intensity, monitors driving speed and body posture, and adjusts the headlight lighting angle.
All of the 40+ Special Functions: ABSBLEED/ BRT / EPB / GEARLEARN / IMMOBILIZER / INJECTOR / Oil / SAS / TPMS / TPS / DPF / SUSPENSION / SUNROOF / GEARBOX / AJUSTE FUEL / AFS / ODOMETER / CLUTCH / Language / SEATMATCH / Turbo / WinDoor / PFP / EGR / TCMOIL / ATADAPTION / AIRBAG / CHANGETIRE / EVAPTEST / ADBLUE / COOLANT / ENGPBM / HVOLBAT / MOTANG / NOXSENSOR / STOPSTART / TRANSPORT / ICCS / GPF / ACINI
>>> OE-Level All System Diagnoses with All-Around & In-depth Diagnoses
Vident iSmart800Pro BT full-system diagnostic tool works well on 110+ car makes and models worldwide (1996 and newer) to read/ clear codes, read ECU info., view Live Data, do active tests, and perform special functions for certain systems.
① Read ECU Information of the control units including unit type, version numbers, etc.
② Read / Clear DTCs to locate problems and clear the codes after certain repairs.
③ View Live Data of each parameter item in various modes, such as text, waveform, or combination (4 in 1 data stream).
④ Active Test/Bi-directional Control to accurately figure out whether a specific system, component, or subsystem in certain parts goes well or not.
⑤ Special Functions to do various daily automotive maintenance functions on certain systems.
 >>> Widely Compatible With 110+ Brand Worldwide Vehicles
For example, For Audi, For BYD, For Benz, For BMW, For Ford, For GM, For VW, For Honda, For Holden, For Citroen etc.
>>> 17 Kinds Language To Avoid Language Barriers And Use It Around The World Without Restriction
Support English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Dutch, Swedish, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Hungarian, Thai, Slovakia, Polish.
>>> 2-Year Warranty & 3-Year Free Updates & Professional Tech Support 
2 Year Warranty: During the two-year period you can contact us via ebay message with any questions you may have.
3 Year Free Updates: The update allows the device to support more cars, as well as gain more comprehensive function.
Professional Tech Support: When you have doubts in the process of use, welcome to contact us, we will contact the technical staff to provide professional support.
>>> Auto Vin & Auto Scan / Support CAN FD+DoIP Protocols
Automatically retrieve the vehicle identification number for comprehensive all available systems scan for quick diagnostics.
Support CAN FD+DoIP Protocols to Compatible with the latest vehicles.
>>> Full OBD2 Functions Supported
1. Read Codes: confirm which section of the emission control system has malfunctioned.
2. Erase Codes: erases the codes from the vehicle after certain repairs.
3. Live Data: Support to see all real-time data streams, displays the dynamic data of the data stream items in text and graphical way, Simpler and easier to understand. Besides, it supports viewing multiple data dynamics in one graph.
4. View Freeze Frame: records the certain vehicle conditions when an emission-related fault occurs.
5. I/M Readiness: determine if your vehicle is ready for a smog test, Quick State Emissions readiness check, and drive cycle verification.
6. O2 Monitor Test: monitors and tests operation of the O-2 s-ensors to identify problems that can affect fuel efficiency and vehicle emissions.
7. On-Board Monitor Test: retrieves test results for emission-related powertrain components and systems that are not continuously monitored.
8. Component Test: allows to control operation of vehicle components, tests or systems.
9. Vehicle Information: Retrieve vehicle’s Vehicle recognition number, c-alibration ID, and c-alibration verification number.
10. Modules Present: identifies module IDs and communication protocols for OBD2 modules in the vehicle.
 >>> 4 IN 1 Live Data
For clear and complete health status check, ability to record all available live data parameters and graph any four on screen at once.
>>> Package Included
1x iSmart800Pro BT
1x Protective Box
1x Charger
1x UK Adapter
1x EU Adapter
1x US Adapter

1.If the brake pad wears the brake pad sense line, the brake pad sense line sends a signal sense line to the on-board computer to replace the brake pad. After replacing the brake pad, you must reset the brake pad. Otherwise, the car alarms.
2.Reset must be performed in the following cases:
a) The brake pad and brake pad wear sensor are replaced.
b) The brake pad indicator lamp is on.
c) The brake pad sensor circuit is short, which is recovered.
d) The servo motor is replaced.
Anti-theft Matching:
1.To prevent the car being used by unauthorized keys, the anti-theft key matching function must be performed so that the immobilizer control system on the car identifies and authorizes remote control keys to normally use the car.
2.When the ignition switch key, ignition switch, combined instrument panel, ECU, BCM, or remote control battery is replaced, anti-theft key matching must be performed.
DPF Regeneration:
1.DPF regeneration is used to regularly clear PM (particulate matter) from the trap in combustion oxidation mode (such as high temperature heating combustion, fuel additive or catalyst reduce PM fire point combustion) to stabilize trap performance.
2.DPF regeneration matching must be performed in the following cases:
a) The bleeding backpressure sensor is replaced.
b) The PM trap is removed or replaced.
c) The fuel additive injector is removed or replaced.
d) The catalytic oxygenizer is removed or replaced.
e) The DPF regeneration MIL is on and maintenance is performed.
f) The DPF regeneration control module is replaced.
Odometer Calibration:
1.Instrument panel mileage calibration is used to copy, write, or rewrite mileages. That is, use the car diagnostic computer and data line to copy, write, or rewrite chip data on the instrument panel to make the instrument panel display actual mileages.
2.Usually, when the vehicle speed sensor is damaged or the mileage is incorrect due to instrument panel faults, you must perform mileage calibration after maintenance.
Adblue Reset:
After the diesel exhaust gas treatment fluid (automobile urea) is replaced or filled up, the urea reset operation is required.
Tire Pressure Reset:
1.After the tire pressure MIL turns on and maintenance is performed, the tire pressure resetting function must be performed to reset tire pressure and turn off the tire pressure MIL.
2.Tire pressure resetting must be performed after maintenance is performed in the following cases: tire pressure is too low, tire leaks, tire pressure monitoring device is replaced or installed, tire is replaced, tire pressure sensor is damaged, tire is replaced for the car with tire pressure monitoring function
Service Lamp Reset:
1.If the service lamp is on, you must provide service for the car. After service, you need to reset the driving mileage or driving time so that the service lamp turns off and the system enables the new service cycle.
2.After changing engine oil or electric appliances that monitor oil life, you need to reset the service lamp.
Headlamp Matching:
This function is used to initialize the adaptive headlight system. The adaptive headlight system determines whether to automatically turn on the headlight according to ambient light intensity, monitors driving speed and body posture, and adjusts the headlight lighting angle.
